game.name: Stickman Physics Battle Arena
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Level up and unlock the ultimate weapons in a bloody physics playground! You must kill countless enemies to increase your stats and become the greatest warrior. Dual wield over 75 unique and fun weapons in 7 different modes across nearly 100 different levels with up to 2 players in co-op or VS.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Level up and unlock the ultimate weapons in a bloody physics playground! You must kill countless enemies to increase your stats and become the greatest warrior. Dual wield over 75 unique and fun weapons in 7 different modes across nearly 100 different levels with up to 2 players in co-op or VS.
